question: Select the correct sequence for transport of sperm cells in male reproductive system.
correct_answer: Seminiferous tubules  Rete testis  Vasa efferentia  Epididymis  Vas deferens  Ejaculatory duct Urethra  Urethral meatus
user_answer: testis  Epididymis  Vasa efferentia  Rete testis -tInguinal canal  Urethra
